parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To spit. A primary verb; to spit.
Adverb perhaps from the base of chasma through the idea of a fissure in the soil; earthward, i.e. Prostrate.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Clay, mud. Perhaps a primary word; clay.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To spread on, anoint. From epi and chrio; to smear over.
Clay, mud. Perhaps a primary word; clay.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The eye; fig: the mind's eye. From optanomai; the eye; by implication, vision; figuratively, envy.
